name: Keith Grisco
text: This guy is rude as can be, was ok at first .We saw his sign on the side of the road and gave him a cal. He missed first appt.  he finally went and looked where we wanted a fence and then gave me a price. After a couple days I called him to start the process, tell him I wanted to go ahead then he started with the BS. Saying he didn’t know if he had the material, wasn’t sure if he could get it. Said it would be 2-3 weeks which was fine because I didn’t need the fence up until then. He said he needed to meet with us to go over this and that and I said well my wife is in town for just a few days and gave him her number. He said he’d call. She didn’t hear from him so I texted him, he said he’d call. Almost a week later he called. My wife said that was last week, we aren’t in town now. Then he got rude as hell again.

name: Matthew Tucker
text: Company rep was extremely rude on the phone, like I was entirely wasting his time inquiring about material costs. Zero customer relationship skills and I won’t ever consider this guy again.

name: Faith Hope
text: I had a great experience with this company.  I recently moved to the area and was searching for a fence company to replace my fence and gate.  Someone recommended Swearingen so I gave them a call.  They gave me a fair quote and did an excellent job. They were very professional and were out on time and the work was done on schedule.   I have more fence work that will be needed in the future and will be calling them again! Great people quality work and fair price.  Thanks Swearingen Fence and Deck!! I'm very happy with the work you did.

name: Don Harris
text: They just replaced a large portion of our  driveway and sidewalk. They removed the cracked sections, hauled off the debris and replaced the concrete in one day. All the workers were GREAT! They were very polite and even engaged my grandchildren who were watching. Everyone knew what they were doing. Rarely do products or services meet expectations and never do they exceed them. In this case they exceeded ALL my expectations. I would highly recommend this company should you need any remodeling, fence or driveway work. It was a pleasure to do business with them.

name: Bill Lewis
text: Very professional and we have used them for years at different houses I feel very comfortable recommending them to anyone they are the best

name: Austin Taylor
text: I was flexible on appointment time and contractor arrived late for a time he set. I wanted him to quote a deck build and privacy fence. I was looking for options on building the deck and he was visibly frustrated that I just didn't have a set design for him to quote. As an engineer and a business owner I understood that, but thats often part of the process. Then he mentioned he would reuse the existing rotted ledger board on the house. I kept my mouth shut but I was definitely on guard after he said that. Next I wanted him to quote a wooden privacy fence around a pool. We came to an area that required a metal section of fence across my driveway.  He told me it wasn't an option to use anchor bolts on concrete for the posts.  As someone he has a fair amount of experience about anchoring I flat out told him it was if he did it correctly.  Once again he got very irate. Then he told me it would take $7000 to cover the 60' section of driveway.  I pointed out that the metal section across the driveway is the same width as the 20' wide pool I wanted to fence off - it does not require anywhere near 60' of fence to go across a 2-car wide driveway. He got mad again when I told him this - but, I mean it's just so obvious.  He stormed off, saying he and I weren't going to get along and I could find someone else. A frustrating waste of time and certainly did not inspire confidence in me that this contractor was competent. He may in fact be competent, but with people skills like that you might never know for sure. I rarely write reviews but in this case I would definitely exercise great caution if engaging this person in any improvement project.

name: Christopher Smith
text: From the moment I first called for an estimate to continued follow-up, Swearingen Fence has been AMAZING!  Mr Swearingen, the owner, took all the phone calls, and followed-up personally.  When things altered even slightly, he called or texted instantly to keep us up to date.  He and his team have were extremely professional, courteous, and timely.  The work is GORGEOUS.  His fees were very reasonable, and he was honest about everything without us ever feeling pressured about the different products.  Even when our HOA audibled and wanted us to put another gate on, he and his team easily made it happen without concern.  I cannot recommend this company enough!

name: Warren Carr
text: Their attention to detail and making sure everything is right with customers is unsurpassed. Beautiful craftsmanship!

name: Chris Dufrene
text:
You're here wondering who you should hire for that painting job right? I know, I know...it's difficult to decide! So let me help you. We, like you, looked for a painting company and settled on Hayes. Kevin and his teammate (Bo) came in and absolutely exceeded our expectations.
I will attach some pics for reference but let me settle your choice with some words we would will use to describe Hayes Painting:

Perfectionist
Precision
Professional
Honest
Quality
Impressive
Responsive
On time.....and more
And we also hired him to do some pressure washing soon.
And the kicker????? They cleaned up after themselves! Like REALLY cleaned up.
So yes, the answer you're looking for is yes. Hire them. Our dealings with this company have been easy.....all of life should be so well done and easy.
Kudos Kevin and crew!

resp.text:
Thank you so much for the kind words. I hope to work again with you both in the future.
Kevin Hayes

text: I have worked with and hired many contractors as a real estate agent and home owner, and I can confidently say that Hayes Painting sets themselves apart. They do what they say they're going to do, show up on time and stay on the job until it's finished. They pick up after themselves, and they do an excellent job of communicating and asking questions about the work you want performed. You're going to pay a little more for their service and quality of work, but it's worth the investment.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. I hope you guys enjoy your beautiful home.

text: As a senior woman living alone with a canine companion, it's not easy to have 4 guys take over your home for 2 full weeks! But Kevin Hayes and team made it as comfortable as possible. If you're in the market for professional, superior quality work accomplished by a talented team of helpful, super-nice guys, you're not going to do better than Hayes! The job was beautifully done. My house looks amazing! And I feel I made 4 friends in the process.

text: The original paint on our home was a nightmare. There were streaks, different finishes of paint, and inconsistent patches of color. name: Michael Daniel
text:
8 years ago we hired Pickett Construction to install a new roof, gutters and downspouts, and vinyl siding on our home. The quality of workmanship was outstanding, and the work was completed in  only 5 days. My wife and I could not have been happier.

Then last month after a rain shower, we noticed water stains on the ceiling in two different rooms. Because Pickett installed the roof 8 years ago, we called them about the problem. Josh sent his roofer to our home to see if a cause for the water leak(s) could be found, because from the outside the roofing shingles were not damaged or missing and looked fine. However after a few minutes looking in the attic and walking the roof, it was determined that during construction of my home some 25 years ago, a handful of framing nails used to secure the plywood roof deck had missed the rafter below, and after all these years had begun to back out of the plywood deck, pushing up the roof shingle just enough to let water pass underneath. The roofer walked the entire roof looking for nails that were backing out (not just in the area of the water stains below, but the whole roof), removing all that he found, sealing the hole and making sure the roof shingle lay flat. Two days after the repairs we had a lot of rain, and no water leaks inside the house.

Once again, Pickett Construction has made my wife and I very happy, and I will not hesitate to call them in the future. It's nice to know that the quality of workmanship and professionalism we knew 8 years ago is still present today.

name: tb harvey
text: Hired these people to do light repairs and painting.  Took 3 weeks to complete the painting.  They did poor preparation work on several parts of the house.  They did not paint the rear door to my detached garage,though they painted the trim.  They bent the gutter on my garage and was balking at replacing it until I showed some video.  They did not remount one of my porch lights, nor did they reattach a lens to one of the driveway flood lights. They left trash in the yard and on the front porch and in the plants behind the house. They missed painting trim on one of the back doors.  They replaced a French door that was alarmed. They had to detach the alarm panel from the wall because the new door trim was slightly larger.  After they finished the alarm would not work nor did they remount the alarm panel...just left it hanging by the wires.  When I questioned them the reply was “we don’t do that kind of work.”  Overall the work was substandard and the post work cleanup nearly nonexistent. Cannot recommend these folks . I have pictures if you need to see.

name: Kurt DeAngelis
text:
We decided to do a major renovation on our 30 year old split foyer in Alabaster. I had a huge wish list that far exceeded the funds I had available and had to prioritize needs, essentilas and desirables. Josh assisted me in mximizing the budget with a detailed proposal that enabled me to do this. Josh did a great job with my wife letting her see and select the tile, flooring and paint, etc.

Do you want to know if Pickett is versatile or can get the job done fast? Pickett did the following items in 17 days ... 350 feet of new privacy fence and gates, paint entire house exterior, re-roof covered deck, remove turbines and patch roof areas, repair rotted roof decking around chimney stack, re-flashed and re-roofed the area, installed new LED motion detecting security lights, installed new outdoor lighting over front door,replaced all windows with new double hung, double pane vinyl windows, installed new laminate/engineered word floors on the entire main level of the house, laid tile in both foyers, kitchen and den/study, replaced every interior door and all hardware, installed new ceiling fans in each bedroom and main foyer, removed wrought iron raining in foyer and replaced with wood and balusters, primed and painted all interior trim, scraped popcorn/acoustic ceiling from kitchen, repaired drywall issues in bedrooms and kitchen, textured and painted kitchen walls.

Any "extra" I asked about was repsonded with a written proposal so that there could be no confusion or disaggrement.

To get these things done in the time frame of 17 days ... including holidays ... shows excellent planning and execution. I was kept informed as to what was scheduled for the day, who would be there and what to expect. They arranged for the construction dumpster delivery and pick up. Pickett did a nice job on the site clean up as well.

Punch list items were few and far between and resolved promptly.

The only thing that would be close to a concern or a negative was the sub-contracting tile guy who was going through a diviorce while he did the job. He did not do a bad job but his distraction resulted in a couple of small punch list things that Josh had Tripp take care of. I was assured that they would not be using this tile guy in the future.

Would I recommend Pickett Construction to you? Absolutely. Want to see pics of the renovation? I have them. Will I use them again in the future? Absolutely. As a matter of fact, my daughter used them on a foreclosure she purchased in Calera. She got prompt thorough quality work done as well.

name: Tim Calhoun
text:
Pricing:
We contracted with Pickett to complete some work on our house to prepare it for sale. We were looking for some typical wood rot to be replaced and exterior paint. We also requested an interior paint quote. I think the quote was a bit high for the exterior work, but not so bad that I didn't go with their services. The quote for the interior painting was outrageous, so we opted for another painter. The other painter's quote was nearly $3000 less than the quote from Pickett. We were also having some plywood put in the ceiling of the carport, because the builder used interior drywall in our neighborhood. Pickett gave us a "complimentary upgrade" to beadboard instead of plain plywood. This really added a nice touch to the carport ceiling, and was an appreciated upgrade. They only requested 1/2-down to start the work, which we felt was certainly reasonable. They also honored their coupon they regularly have (often in the Alabaster Newsletter, or ValPack). We printed ours from the ValPack website.

Workmanship:
The quality of the exterior work was pretty good. There were a few spots where the painting got a bit "sloppy," but was overall good work. The beadboard in the carport made a great upgrade to our carport, and added a touch of "class" to an otherwise mundane area of the house. Unfortunately, due to our unusually cold winter, the holidays, and several bouts with rain, our work was regularly delayed. It took a bit longer than expected to complete, but didn't delay our schedule of listing the house. The little interaction I had with the crew was polite and courteous, though at times the project manager came across as mildly arrogant. Communicating with the PM via email was the best medium, although he sometimes took a bit longer than expected to return messages.

Post Work Follow-up:
Again, the delays in returning messages made for a challenge in clearing our post-work "punch list," but this was also around the holidays, so we conceded a bit.  Had there been more clear communication about workday expectations (e.g. workers will/will not be onsite today) this would have made for better overall feeling about the length of the job.
During our home buyer's inspection, they found more wood rot that was inadvertently overlooked by the crew. While I don't expect the painters to look over every square inch of the house (heck, neither did I!), it ended up being a significant portion of the chimney that had rotted out the edge of our masonite siding. One would expect that at least part of that might have been discovered and either repaired or at least alerted me to the potential change in an estimate so it could be repaired. When we approached our PM about correcting it, he gave us a price quote. After paying over $6000 for the original work, this was certainly unexpected, especially with their "1 year warranty." I spoke with Josh, the owner's son who is also in management with the company. He immediately started working with me to find a reasonable solution. I ended up having to pay a bit more, but we did come to an acceptable compromise on the final cost of the supplemental work. In the end, Josh personally stopped by the house to deliver the revised agreement and took pictures of the missed work. It turned out that the rot was more severe than even he expected. He opted to continue to honor that revised estimate and didn't charge anymore. Josh really worked hard to make a relatively displeasing situation wok out well in the end. Josh was absolutely committed to service and ensuring my end satisfaction. He even reached out after the supplemental work was completed to check in on my satisfaction, and knowing there was a bit of a sour taste, still wanted this Google Review. Josh knows what it takes to listen to customer concerns and immediately find a reasonable solution that works in the best interest of all parties. Had it not been for Josh's actions, my 4-star rating would have been a high 2-star, or low 3-star.

text: Caddyshack

name: Mike Cutler
text:
If it were possible to give more than five (5) stars I would do so without hesitation.  From my first contact with Linda to schedule a time to review our home for a quote, to meeting Brent for a walk through so he could quote the job, to having the crew of Gary, Donnie, Chad, Jorge and Leo perform the job over three (3) days, this company was totally professional.

Each day Gary and crew arrived slightly before the agreed time, Gary provided a review of what had been done and what was scheduled for the day while the crew went about set up and starting their assigned tasks.  Throughout the project everything in our home was treated with utmost care when moved and later replaced.  And during the project Brent stopped by to check on the project and ask if we had any concerns.  We also had the opportunity to speak with each member of the crew, individually and in small groups and found them to be very engaging and respectful.  During our project, based on the high quality of work, we expanded the total project, adding additional work items both inside (doors) and outside (pressure wash).

CertaPro's bid was very competitive, but was not the lowest of the three companies we spoke to.  However, from day one they set a high bar of professionalism, engagement and excellence that the others just could not quite meet.

We are completely satisfied with CertaPro and would engage them without hesitation on future projects.  Lastly, both before and after our project I told Brent, Gary and the crew that I would "talk about them" based on their performance.  On the last day, as Gary and the crew were preparing to depart I let them know that my wife and I were so happy with the results, we would be bragging about them to friends, family, neighbors, etc.

resp.text: Thank you so much Mike! We truly appreciate all of your kind words and the time you spent writing this review. We are so glad that you love the results. That's what we strive for with everyone. Please know even know the services are done, we are here for you whenever you need us. Thank you again and take care.

name: Rick Harris
text:
Lisenby Construction just finished a three-week remodel of our kitchen and living room, and we could not be more pleased.  The project involved demo of some existing kitchen cabinets, replacement of a cook top and stove with a range, replacement of a vent hood, installing new kitchen lighting, laying tile, painting cabinets and bookshelves, painting trim, and painting walls.  All of this was handled by David's crew without having to sub out any work. The quality of the work done was really top-tier.  We used David's decorating consultant, Lindy, to help pick out colors, and the result has significantly brightened and beautified the two rooms where we spend most of our waking hours.

When you undertake a project that takes this much time, you quickly realize that you have invited some strangers into your home for a lengthy stay.   Well, the guys David sent did not stay strangers for very long.  They were cheerful, friendly, and helpful to us.  They added, without cost, some features to the project at our request, even though these features were not in the original contract-- for example, installing a dimmer switch in the kitchen, replacing flood lights in our dinette area so they would match the color put out by our new kitchen lighting, cutting out the trim along one wall of our living room so our bookcase could lay flat against the wall, and installing wall outlets in our bookcase.  They cleaned up after themselves every day and hauled away their own trash.  When they moved furniture around to do some painting, they always put it back where it had been.  It got to where we enjoyed having the company at our house.  At the end of the job, we were glad it was completed, but we were sorry to see the guys leave.

All the work was done with great attention to detail.  They found and installed tile to match our existing kitchen backsplash tile.  They worked on our project every weekday for three weeks.  On some days, they worked on our cabinet doors and bookcase at their shop, but on the days when they did not come, David always called us to let us know they would not be there and what they would be doing that day.

We will certainly call on Lisenby Construction if we undertake new remodeling projects.  Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you Rick for your kind words and for trusting us with your home remodeling needs!

name: Susan Schneider
text: The end product exceeded our expectations. The quality of the craftsmanship was excellent. The Lisenby team was courteous, professional and provided excellent quality work. I would recommend them to anyone anticipating a home upgrading.

resp.text: Thank you Susan! We enjoyed working with you guys! Your new Kitchen is beautiful!

name: Caitlin Singletary
text: This was our first remodel, and it could not have gone smoother! The team was easy to talk to, and they were easy to reach when we had questions. They kept us up-to-date on expectations and the timing of everything. The remodel took 4 days (from demo to completion). The team arrived early each day, and they even worked holidays. They cleaned up daily (vacuumed and cleaned stainless steel appliances). We were also impressed when working with a company they contracted with. While the other company was doing their part, the Lisenby team was present, and they made sure the job was done right/well. In fact, at one point, the Lisenby team told the other team to fix something before leaving. Overall, we were highly impressed, and we intend to work with Lisenby again in the near future when we do additional remodeling!

resp.text: Thank you for letting us work on your kitchen Caitlin, we will look forward to working with you again! And thank you referring to us as a team, we work hard on developing a team culture here.

name: Beverly McCutcheon
text:
TRAVIS, I got the best finally. Gave up, looked for Gutter Repair. 8 years of misery with Gutter Company that installed never could fix. Same areas. Travis has been here several times repairs and so much more. More then I can say this man has done.Truly needed him years ago. Stopped all the problems I have had for 8 years with leaking gutters, A nightmare for me. I feel rescued. Has been so great I could never say enough about him. A really nice man too I got know well as I was out there with him showing me what was wrong and needed. So where would I be now without Travis. Another person or new gutters? First day he came I was horrified what he found. Asked him do I just need new gutters again, was worried then about the whole house. He said no, he was repairing them, I needed to see what was wrong, those areas. Travis saved me a lot money and stress I have been through with the thought of new gutters and couldn’t be repaired. I will always use him.
I see now here too maybe he can clean them. Had no
Idea all the other things this company can do. Will be helpful for me too. All the great reviews and I have just gotten one of them, Travis. Must be just like him.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We are very pleased that you were happy with Travis and will pass that along to him!!

name: Devon Rankin
text: Hired BFP to install screens for my existing back porch. Blake contacted me the day after I submitted my request to talk through it. We communicated via text and phone after as questions came up and then Blake put together a detailed scope for the work and made great suggestions for materials to use for the job. We ran into problems sourcing the materials (very high demand!), but he kept me informed of the delay along the way and was able to begin work as soon as we had what we needed. Work was performed over a 3 day period, and Blake showed up on time and worked diligently each day. He kept me updated on his progress during the day and the end product turned out great. We can't wait to start using our newly screened porch.

resp.text: Thank you so much Devon!  We are so pleased that everything went well and will happily share your kind works with Blake!

text: BFR is the best in the business! I wish I called them sooner. Thanks Seth and Gibbs.

name: Bryan Ramsey
text: About a month ago I had posted a negative review about Birmingham Fast Repair, and I'm here to say that I was WRONG!!! They were quick to respond in the most professional manner to my complaint. Seth made this matter his top concern, which every customer would want. This just goes to show the quality of customer service this group has. Seth was very apologetic (which he did not need to be) and did a fantastic job on installing my french patio doors. Seth was such a pleasure to be around. Not only was he professional, but he took time to get to know me and my family, which went beyond my expectations. His work and craftsmanship were very impressive. He definitely knows his work and set the bar very high. I could write this review all day on how pleased we were to have him in our home and his work product. I feel like I have finally found a company that I can trust to do an Honest, and PROFESSIONAL job at an unbeatable price. Seth's work has transformed our home beyond what we thought it could look like. I would highly recommend SETH and Birmingham Fast Repair for all of your projects. They will definitely be my "go-to" company for future projects.

text: It was a pleasure working with Chris. I live out of state and own a 4 plex. One of the units were vacant and needed some paint/drywall work before being put back on the market. He was very willing to go above and beyond in assisting me. He provided before and after pictures and a walk through video explaining everything so I could be comfortable with his work. I can't physically be there, so he was my eyes and brought unknown issues to my attention, which he verified with pictures. I have a property management company, but their bids were high to do some of this work, which is why I shopped around and found Birmingham Fast Repair.  They also didn't catch some of the issues Chris did. My experience leads me to believe that Chris is nothing short of honest, knowledgeable, trustworthy, and hardworking. Highly recommended.

name: Bryan Ramsey
text: It took about a month for someone to come out to do measurements (started the 2nd week of March). I was told I would be contacted 2 weeks later for an install. I understand this happened at the beginning of the COVID-19 situation and is a hard time for all of us, but I had not received any other communication or follow up from anyone. I had sent text messages on 2 occassions (a month after measurments) and no response. I'm not sure what its like in this line of work, but I was willing to spend close to $3K on the project and not a peep from anyone. This may not seem like a lot of money in this line of work, but $3K for a day or two of work I would be running to complete this job. I'm  concerned about the lack of follow-thru in communication. There are plenty of people that need work and it's disappointing to see the lack of interest.

resp.text: Bryan, I appreciate the feedback. Obviously we missed the mark on this one and I sincerely apologize. I’ll certainly look into what went wrong and make the necessary adjustments to prevent this from happening again!

name: Grace Willis
text:
Couldn't recommend anyone better! (Ask for Ethan!)

I called Birmingham Fast Repair to book a quote and possible appointment to install a pedicure chair's foot rest at my job. They were very fast and informative to book someone for us. They sent an email with a name/photo/bio/contact of who the handyman would be. He followed up the day before and day of (before the appointment).

Upon arrival he was prepared and friendly. He assessed the parts/chair and confidently installed everything exactly as needed and at a timely manner -- I commend him for agreeing to fix it, especially since he had never worked on a pedi chair (who even has?) and it's fairly complex considering there are water lines and pipes involved. He communicated everything very well.

Thank you for everything. We will definitely be recommending you all to everyone we can!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! It means so much!

text: Let me tell you, Kenneth Wells And Jose did a fantastic job from the timely estimate to the completion of the interior paint project. I would highly recommend pro1 painters for any of your painting needs. I will use them again in the future and have already referred my friends.

name: Frank Keller
text:
Kevin and Amanda is who done our painting , we had hallways , living room, and bathrooms painted they had to use 3 coats due to covering the dark colors we had plus some repairs. We are extremely happy with there work they were professional all the way. They were in and out in one day done a great job, there clean up after completion was great and were awesome to work with . We would and will recommend them and Pro 1 Painters to anyone needing a good job done on there home. We Thank  everyone at Pro 1 the staff inside and out are excellent.
FRANK AND Donna Yanity.

name: Emily Carlson
text:
I first used Pro1 Painters in 2016 right after buying my new house. They were amazing. Showed up on time, scheduled everything flawlessly, were in and out quickly, and did a phenomenal job. So, when I needed repair work after Hurricane Sally, they were the first company I called.

Little did I know when I hired them again, I would not receive the same great customer service.

The majority of the work was in the garage and it was easy to stay out of their way. The next dat, I went out to start putting things back where they belonged. I had one piece of furniture that I planned on relocating to a different oart of the garage and when I went to move it, I realized that they never moved it to begin and only painted around it.

I called on Wednesday and was assured someone would return my call that afternoon to come back and return the call. No one did. I called again this morning and Dana said the team claimed they moved everything and questioned me about the validity of my report. I told her what they didn't move and she said Britney would call me later to schedule. No one called. They did happily have time to cash my check though.

You would think a company with as good of a reputation that Pro1 Painter's has, they would be embarrassed by the oversight and send someone back immediately. Nope. They're really just a company that cashes a check then runs.

It really is a shame that the quality customer service Pro1 Painter's used to have no longer exists.

resp.text: Mrs. Carlson, thank you for bringing this issue to our attention on Wednesday May 19th. Pro 1 Painters is not perfect but when we make a mistake we are always there to fix it. Thank you for allowing us to come to your home on May 21st to correct this issue. Again thank you for your patience. - Rene Pollet

name: Cannon Sommerville

The wooden doors were in poor condition he made them look basically new!! The wooden beams & wooden railing is so smooth and the stain looks incredible!! The rebar railing was rusty & crusty they were able to make it look really great with the black enamel finish. My client saw the project just a few days ago and was blown away by the fine craftsmanship of the Pro One painters. I highly recommend using their services.

text:
Ok I’ll spill the beans this is by far the worst company to work for. I have been wronged by 3 different ways by these people and would strongly advise against their business. I used to work for the company so trust me, I know. I wasn’t called into work for 3 weeks. Why? Because my uncle got into a severe car crash, who was a lead for their company as well, instead of giving me the common decency to let me go the day of, I don’t get let go to 3 weeks later “because we didn’t want to upset you further”. Now why would they be trying to fire you in the first place? Because I worked for alcoholic who got caught drinking on the job two weeks after my release. So they took the word of an alcoholic over mine. Let’s talk business ethics, everything is done to be quick, you might ask for 2 coats but if it’s passable at 1 best believe they’ll only use 1. Since I worked with company I can tell you countless costumers that were not pleased with Pro 1s business. Also it’s a very drug heavy business. While I am the not the one to shame one for their addictions,  I can say almost everybody their has some sort of problem. If DEFINITELY not more efficient painters, then I’m sure you can find yourself a painter for a couple thousand cheaper.
Edit: of course because it’s not my real name... which you know. That’s just you and your company trying not to get exposed

resp.text: We have checked the employment records of Pro1Painters and have NO RECORD of anyone ever employed by the name of Suran Pack. All of our employees are W2’d so we have very detailed records. Please call our office Monday at 621 1100 and we will be more than happy to assist you in locating the company.

text:
We had a really good experience with this company. They fit us into their schedule when the painter we had hired canceled on us at the last minute. And they finished on time, as promised, although it was a big job (3100 sf house) and two rooms required a third coat to hid the previous wall color. They were very responsive to any requests and concerns we had and kept us updated as to what they would be working on each day. Everything was covered properly and drapery rod brackets, faceplates, etc removed. The results were beautiful. It was a high quality job from start to finish. We are planning on getting them back in the future to do some cabinets.

name: Thomas Nettles
text:
Description of work: All painted surfaces were pressured washed.  Surfaces were scraped of peeling paint and sanded.  Glossy surfaces were sanded to ensure proper adhesion.  Caulking was replaced and in some areas applied where caulking didn't previously exist.  All areas of bare wood were primed.  Applied two coats of Sherwin-Williams Emerald Exterior Latex Paint.

Work experience: The job provided was of excellent quality.  If you are just looking for the lowest bid, this is not the painting contractor for you.  If you are looking for a highly professional and superior quality job at a reasonable cost than this firm should be considered.  I couldn't be happier with the finished job.  The painters were professional and polite, showed up on time, stayed on the job until complete, and did what they stated they would do in a complete written quote.  In addition, each morning, the lead painter provided a verbal review of the work planned that day and provided answers to my questions.  When the job was complete, the owner and I conducted a final review to make sure I was satisfied with the job.  I was especially pleased with a suggestion from the lead painter involving the shutters and the paint scheme.  My wife loved the look.  I would use this contractor again and would recommend them to my family and friends.  I believe that is the best thing you can say about a contractor.

resp.text: Thanks Thomas! We are glad you we were able to provide you with an excellent experience! We look forward to working with you in the future.

name: Shastity Driscoll
text:
Purchased a new home that needed painting from DIY pain jobs and factory one color entire house deal. Searched for a paint company here in Mobile, got a few bids and HAPPY I went with Pro 1! From the start Kevin was detailed and gave pretty honest advisements.Kevin responds promptly for estimate concerns and any painting questions. No pressure, just facts and would be thankful if you chose their services. We are a military family and didn't want to feel pressured. Thats how Kevin approached my estimate.
Melanie got me booked, color at Sherwin went great, Katie responded promptly with a financial question, and painters rocked the job! These painters, Don, Chris and the gentleman with the red beard (forgive me, I forgot his name) work SOO hard! They are PRECISE and go out of their way to be sure the job looks professional. The painters made sure they left it looking like new walls and ceilings. The value of my home increased and the way my paint job is, it TOTALLY  made the home look custom.
Prices are reasonable for the EXPERTISE they provide. Hands down, so far so good. I have 4 more rooms to complete and if all goes well, that last star will be added. Thats the ONLY reason I have it at 4 stars, because I dont want to jinx myself (If all keeps going well, last star will be added for sure), but these painters KNOW what they are doing.
Don't shortchange yourself by hiring random people, stick to professional painters Pro 1 provides. The painters even have pleasant attitudes and I feel comfortable with them in my home, which says enough on its on.
So heres to finishing my entire home. Thanks Pro 1!
(P.S. On my first encounter estimate, I only had 3 rooms, but since it all went so well, I'm having them do my ENTIRE home. That says a lot.)

name: Brooke Gamble
text: Altract did a great job on painting our home!   They met all of our expectations and if something wasn't correct Jordan made sure it was fixed in a timely manner.  We will definitely use them again in the future!!

resp.text: Thank you, Brooke! We looking forward to assisting in anything you may need! Thank you so much for the opportunity to serve you and your family. Have a great Halloween

name: Brian Boackle
text: When it came time to get my house painted, I did my research and found Altract to be highly rated so I gave them a shot.  What a COMPLETE DISAPPOINTMENT!  Bryant Darby came for the initial consultation and was very thorough and detail oriented, so I could only assume the painters would follow suit. Long story short, the painters were absolutely terrible! The crew dripped paint EVERYWHERE.  Inside and outside of my house were covered in drips of white paint.  **UPDATE:  The paint drips were on a brand new deck (less than 2 years old); a new rug (less than 2 years old) and newly installed flowerbeds/rocks less than a month before the paint job.  THIS WAS NOT FROM A PREVIOUS PAINT JOB!!!!   Every time they returned to fix something, they'd leave their mark on something else.  It finally got to the point that I didn't even want them on my property any longer.  The lame attempt they made to clean up after themselves was laughable and I was ready to cut my losses** The house wasn't prepped correctly and I have fresh paint peeling already!   They broke bulbs on my string lights and not only didn't tell me, but didn't bother to clean it up!   This crew was completely lazy and careless.  I'm glad others had a pleasurable experiences with Altract, but I would award zero stars if google would allow.

resp.text: Brian, I'm sorry you were unhappy with your painting experience.  The painters did come back to the house to clean off any drips and as we discussed with you onsite many of the drips were from the previous times the house was painted and could not be cleaned.  To my knowledge any drips or spills we were responsible for were cleaned from the house.  If you do have peeling paint from the current job we did for you please remember you have a 3 year warranty that covers any peeling, flaking, or fading. Likely this is not a product of incorrect prep but the conditions in which the paint was applied.  If any moisture gets trapped between the paint and the wood it will peel no matter how well the house was prepped.  This is why we offer the warranty we do.  Please feel free to contact us to schedule any necessary warranty work.  We are happy to fix anything we are responsible for.

name: Claire Green
text: Terrible communication. What should have been a straightforward,  2.5 day job turned into a 5 week nightmare. I give 4 stars for the completed work (some pieces were still not replaced as discussed). However, I give the "supervisor" 0 stars for communication. No call/no show multiple days, even numerous days when weather was not a factor and they could have completed work. Voicemail box was so full I couldn't leave a message. After our color boards were dropped off, we NEVER saw Donnie again. Not once did he come to the jobsite after saying multiple times that he would, even though his crew (and their equipment) was at my house off and on for a month. What a shame because they came recommended by 2 family friends. Very disappointing...

text: I went with the Painting Company because they were the lowest bid. What a mistake. It took them two months to come paint the house and then a week to complete the job. The first day, a foreman came by, but just have me sign some papers. He immediately left and just one painter remained. There was a woman (who was never introduced to me) who came for part of the days, but she wasn't always there. There was no oversight of the painter. He was very polite, but sloppy and didn't want to do all the work that was quoted. There were paint drips everywhere, missed spots, and worst of all, splatters on on my tile floors that do not want to come up. I would not use the Painting Company again.

resp.text: We regret you had a negative experience with our company. We have several painting crews and work diligently to complete our customers projects as soon as possible. During the spring and summer months our schedule does fill up quickly and we do book out a month or two. Some of our larger crews will spilt into 2 person crews in order to reduce the wait for upcoming projects. That is what occurred with your project. The foreman had split his team and was covering two projects at the same time. These jobs are also visited multiple times by our production manager. This particular job was visited several times by the production manager who was not made aware of the complaints. Our foreman also did a walkthrough with the homeowner at the end of a project at which time any problem areas are addressed and the project is signed off by the customer. Unfortunately, we were unaware of problems with your project until this post. Once we were made aware, we contacted you to rectify the problem areas but the home had been sold.

name: Jimmy Lauderdale
text:
Read this review..............
We needed the inside of our home painted,  The entire inside, all the walls and ceilings in every room.  After 20+ years and doing touch up painting as needed, we had to do more and that involved changing colors in about 70% of the house.

We did our due diligence and got three estimates from reputable painters.  The first came in roughly $4000 over our budget and we began to consider just painting the main level.  The second (who we had used in the past) was only $200 over budget, had done good work for us in the past and we were now in a comfortable price range.  The Painting Company was the last we called and came highly recommended by several friends and neighbors.

When Peter and I completed our walk through, he handed me a nice glossy folder containing references, insurance information, standard practices and the like.  We had also discussed upgrading from a contractor grade paint to something better (especially since we are known to only paint when its an absolute necessity).  Peter was courteous and professional and as he drove off, I knew we could never afford what we had discussed.

The bid from the Painting Co came in the next day and was $1600 under budget ($1800 under the next closest bid and $5600 under the high bid).  I read through the detailed list of inclusions and exclusions, the color choices in the different rooms, the type and manufacturer of paint to be used and found it all to be exactly as discussed the day earlier.  We had found ourselves a painter.

We called and set up a date to start, game them a 25% deposit to cover material and began taking down pictures and putting away breakables.

A little over a week later, two painters showed up at the house as scheduled.  They may have been 10 or 15 minutes late.  But, that was all.  The date was correct and they had all their gear and were ready to go.  We walked through the house marking which rooms were to be painted which colors to avoid any confusion or misunderstanding and they began moving furniture, taping the trim and covering everything (and I mean everything.  our house looked like a drop cloth bomb had exploded in it).

That day and part of the next were ceiling days and they began some of the upstairs walls.  The next day the upstairs was complete and they brought the show to the main level.  Three and a half days after beginning, they were cleaning up the house, we did a final walk through, some light touch up and they replaced the furniture before leaving.

They had estimated four to five days and finished in three and a half and the product was nothing short of excellent.  I was contacted promptly when they had the one question that required a minimal amount of homeowner guidance.

It's been a week now and every time we walk into a room we are still amazed by the quality of work and the difference that it makes.  I guess it's time to start planning the painting of the outside again.  The Painting Company will get the job.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the incredibly detailed 5-Star Review, Jimmy!

name: Sandra Short
text: They painted my house onside and out. At first I was happy with it for a week or so and then I started finding unpainted places, peeling paint ..they came back out and painted the unpainted places and repainted where the paint was peeling off bit it was raining the day they came out and now the paint has run and bubbled up.  Now I fiND I can't raise my windows upstairs because they painted them shut.  I will not use them again

resp.text: Sandra.  We have a 3 year warranty so you can call at anytime and we can fix any problems that may arise.  Sometimes in the south with the humidity, windows will stick and they just need a little help to be opened.

name: Tony Sacco
text: They did a good job and they did it fast.  No surprises.  Very fair price.  We had 3 estimates and they had a slightly lower price than the others with the same type of process and paint.  Only minor concern is that they don't have a manager come out to inspect the job after completion.  As the homeowner or client it's up to you to inspect and then sign off that the job is complete.  I spotted a couple minor issues upon my initial review before signing off and they took care of it.  Since then I've spotted a couple more very minor issues that I can handle.  I just think if they had a manager or designated professional inspect the job upon completion they would see things I missed.  That being said, they did a very good job, very quickly at a good price and I would use them again.

I refused to have the same person TRY again.  So still looks terrible, but will have someone else fix.
I got the sloppy/lazy contractor..... all his supplies were in a pile in the van, could not figure how he finds anything.  Used his foot to move the rocks landscaping back up next to the house.  I fixed that after, since it looked like someone used their foot.
Would not recommend this company, although I know others that had a great experience.  Just depends on which sub-contractor/painter you get.

name: Elaine B
text: Was looking for a quote online and home advisor tricked me into giving my number. It was bad enough that the people from “five star” called me FIVE times on a Sunday..Mother’s Day Sunday that I was trying to enjoy with my family...then they called four times the following Monday. Turns out that they passed my info to a call center....because a man with a foreign accent called me at 8:41pm last night. Don’t work with these people, it is a nightmare. They will call you relentlessly, they will call you on Sunday, they will pass your info to others. Please stop calling me.

resp.text:
Elaine, I am SO terribly sorry you had this experience and I will definitely speak with my call center about this.  I use a call center because we are frequently out on jobs and I want my clients to be able to reach us.  Please accept my sincere apology!  Feel free to call me to discuss or if there is anything I can help with.  The call center can connect you directly to me.
Adrain Hammond

name: Holly Johnson
text: Brian and his crew were amazing! We used Five Star to first strip and paint exterior windows for the home we were selling and then again to paint the interior of our new house. His crew had our entire home painted to perfection in two days. Their professionalism and quality of work were top notch. We will definitely be using them for any future painting project!

resp.text: Thank you Holly for the fantastic review! We are pleased to hear Brian and his team did high quality work in a timely fashion. Thank you for you business and enjoy your new home!

name: Kimberly Hamblin
text: Brian set up an estimate for us quickly and helped us to pick paint colors that would compliment our home.  He was nice but most importantly he was very honest. Mr. Derek painted and paid attention to detail of our craftsman style home. We had multiple paint colors and I can honestly say that we couldn’t be more pleased with the work that was done. Highly recommend!!

resp.text: Kimberly, as the owner of Five Star Painting of Dothan, I wanted to personally thank you for the kind words.  We feel privileged to have been chosen to serve you.

name: Doug Schroeder
text: They showed up when they said they would.  They covered the other parts of the building so it didn't get any overspray.  They were great to work with.  I'd recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you Doug! We appreciate the opportunity to work for you and the great review!

name: Kendra Crabbe
text: Really pleased with pricing, quality of work, professionalism and follow-up. Had multiple walls touched up as we vacated a property and listed it for sale. Carl at FSP helped match paint, patch holes and paint so that our house showed well. Was thoughtful enough to wear coverings over his shoes in our home and to tidy up after working. Very thankful!

resp.text: Kendra, thank you for the review.  It was our pleasure to serve you and we are glad we could get your home ready for sale.  We pride ourselves in trying to be neat & clean so, it is nice when someone notices and comments on it.  Thank you!

name: Swaycie Cole
text: Recently had the pleasure of working with this amazing company. They did an amazing job and was very professional and efficient in the job. Would definitely recommend and use them for any painting projects!!

resp.text: Thank you Swaycie.  It was a pleasure working for you.

name: aminta palmer
text: I have been most impressed with this company. They are professional, prompt, informative and beyond helpful.  Very happy to have made this connection.

resp.text: Aminta, I really appreciate the nice review.  Just know we are here if we can assist with anything.

name: Christopher Calvin Reid
text: I highly recommend this company for all your painting needs.

resp.text: Chris, I really appreciate the nice review.  We look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Chris S
text: William did an awesome job painting our entire house's exterior. Even though we surprised him with a last-minute change in the main color choice, he was able to help us pick a new color that fit within the original budget and still looked great. It really changed the house's look for the better! His attention to detail and careful prep work ensured that everything came out looking as best as possible. Would definitely work with him again.

resp.text: Thanks Chris!

name: Tajale McClam
text: William did such a fantastic job on painting two of my bedrooms as well as my ceiling. He did an accent wall to each room and they both look absolutely amazing. He is very professional and his work is very superb. My ceiling was very hard to paint. It is a popcorn style ceiling. He really wanted to make sure it was done right and paid great attention to detail.  I was very pleased with the results. I look forward to using him again. Thank you!

name: Adrian Brown
text: William painted our interior - in hard to reach high places, and ceilings, and some dry wall repair. He did an excellent job and cares about getting the job done right, does not cut corners. He was a great find and will use him in the future and have already recommended to others!

resp.text: Thanks Adrian! Enjoy the new colors.

name: Ming Sun
text: Great work with very reasonable price done in 2017!

name: Kathy Gereski
text: William did an exceptional job power washing our driveway, sidewalk, back porch and steps. He also repaired drywall in our basement and painted all of our exterior railings that were showing wear after 8 years.  I highly recommend his services.

name: Avery Nagata
text: William power washed and stained my fence. It took him less than a week to finish it. He was super responsive and very professional.

I would hire this company again for the same job and will consider them for more jobs in the future. Very satisfied with the finished product!

name: Susan Bachle

name: Jessicalynnsman Hardy
text: This painter is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. He truly stands behind his work and gets the job done. Very satisfied with the work he did in our house. I would definitely use his services again. I promise I will get the good paint next time though. Thank you William for a job extremely well done.

name: Archella George
text: William did an awesome job painting two rooms in our new home! We hired another painter to paint our nursery and not only was the job not satisfactory but the color was too dark for a nursery. William came in and repainted the room and we love it!! He also painted our office for us as well! He was was very detailed and clean and quick! Would definitely recommend him and work with him again!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Mich S
text: William painted the inside of a house I'm putting on the market and did a fantastic job. House looks wonderful. He patched several rough spots and a crack so well that you couldn't tell they existed. He was neat while doing his work, and he cleaned up after himself when he was done. He also pressure washed my fence (looks like new and I was gobsmacked at how good it looked) and painted my front rails and back deck. I would highly recommend him and do plan on using him again.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words and good luck with the sale!

name: Christopher Lawson
text: I've had my whole house painted, but the room this company did for me was superior and excellent. I wish I had hired them for the whole house and will be hiring them in the future. They were friendly, responded to my questions in a timely manner, and were reasonably priced. They worked me into the schedule in a very timely manner as well.

name: Daniel Lewis
text: William did a great job painting and pressure washing for us. The paint makes our interior look so much better! Our fence and deck look brand new! He was able to get us on the schedule quickly and went above and beyond to help us meet a deadline. I highly recommend him!

name: Emily Pauli
text: William painted two rooms, trim, and repaired and painted what I thought was a dry wall ceiling but was the original 1946 plaster. He did an amazing job on all of it!!!  He is professional, very neat, and cleaned each evening and at the ending the job.  Even with the unexpected plaster on the ceiling, William finished on time and budget!  His skills and attention to detail are exceptional. I will use him again - the outside needs an update when the weather warms.

name: RUTH RICHI
text:
Very professional, reasonably priced. Beautiful work, very neat and clean. Our home needed a lot of caulking, nothing was missed. The paint job is beautiful. I am very satisfied and will call him back the next time I need a painter.
Oz and Ruth

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words guys. I enjoyed watching your house transform.  Great customers!

name: Belinda Wolfe
text: I was very satisfied with the work that William of Color Life Painting provided. His work was very high quality and done with in the time frame given. He replaced and painted rotten siding, replaced and painted some eaves and built a lattice panel. He also painted windows, steps, and garage etc. His prices were very reasonable and He was very professional. I would highly recommend using his services.

name: Alex Britt
text: William was way more than impressive. He was professional, timely and his skill set really exceeded are expectations. He painted our front door, half bath and a few accent walls. He will definitely be our choice for our next project!

resp.text: Great Customers, Enjoyed the work.

name: Lisa Carter
text: William did an outstanding job repairing my screened porch. Also he pressure washed the siding on my house for the most reasonable rate I'd found!  Excellent customer service.

text: William did a phenomenal job on our nursery. He was super polite and informative during our inital phone call. After talking about what we needed done, he accommodated our schedule by coming a day in advance and picked up the paint for us. When he showed up at our home, he was everything he portrayed via our phone calls. A very trustworthy and personal guy. And not only is he the kind of painter that you feel comfortable leaving alone to paint, he does an incredible job with his attention to detail. We recommend using William for any paint job and will be using him to finish our home in the near future!

resp.text: Thanks very much for the kind words.  Enjoyed meeting you and looking forward to the future work!

name: John Klingel
text: William did a fantastic job at a GREAT price and held schedule.  He worked with us and was flexible.  We would certainly recommend him for your painting needs.

text:
William did a great job. He has a unique approach to business.... He shows up when he says, and charges the amount that he committed to. Weird concept, but worked pretty well for me!
He painted my deck, handrails, and concrete floor and I was very satisfied. I will use him again.

name: Tom Byrne
text: William did a GREAT job. Lots of attention to detail, very neat. Completed the job ahead of schedule. Did I say he did a GREAT job AAA++

name: Meghan Darby
text: William painted the trim, interior walls, and ceilings of our new (older) home. He was expertly meticulous and all finishes were perfect. We could not be more pleased with the outcome. He also stuck to our timeline, budget, and was extremely trustworthy.

name: Darrell Stokes
text: William has painted a fence, bedroom and bathroom for me.  His prices and especially his quick response and flexibility has allowed me to finish some jobs around the house in a minimal amount of time and cost.  He has always been quick to give me an estimate and even quicker to get out and get the work done.  I will be using him again!

name: Matt H
text: Great job staining my deck! Great attention to detail.  Would definitely recommend.

name: Hal Wilson
text: William: hard worker, and went out of his way to be helpful. The paint job on the side of the house? You've only gotta ask the neighbors. Plus, plus.

name: Jerrell Reynolds
text: Our eves on the house were peeling really bad. I called William and he was able to come out at MY convenience and take care of them. he went the extra mile by scraping off all the old paint to prevent it from peeling again. William did a great job and at a great price. No paint in places its not suppose to be and real clean lines. Rain came in but he came back out on the next day when there was no rain and finished the job. He did such a good job we had him paint our garage door while he was there. defiantly calling him back to do our fence in the near future. A+ job and very professional guy.

name: Marsau Scott
text:
I have had the pleasure of dealing with the owner today. He and I didn't see eye to eye at first, we both communicated our frustration, and in the end we resolved our differences in a healthy manner. People and businesses make mistakes but the mark of a true businessman is how he/she is accepts responsibility for their actions and continues to make positive changes.
Thank you William, I look forward seeing your company progress.

name: Candace Hawkins
text: ICS Roofing is a GREAT Company!!! Jamie was very professional and compassionate. He sat down with my mother and I and explained the cost and what to expect. We were told it would be 3 weeks but they started the next week ( a few days later). The crew were very nice and respectful. I recommend this company if you want a professional and trustworthy company. New roof for a GREAT price.

name: Victoria Gann
text: They are great to work with. They installed one roof for me. Repaired a different one and found the source of the leak, vent cap damaged. They have fixed flashing for me and fixed several worn boots at different properties. They have also inspected a roof for a new purchase and was able to give me a detailed report. They are the most responsive and thorough business I have ever dealt with.

name: April Orr
text: From the initial contact with ICS, I was impressed with their professionalism and attention to detail. Scott was such a pleasure to work with and gave me all of the details and options I needed to make the best decision for my home. He did such a great job keeping me updated that I never had to wonder what was going on with my project and in fact, when he gave me a timeline, things were completed ahead of that. Scott clearly enjoys his job and I value his expertise and passion to perform at the highest of his abilities. The roofers themselves were polite, clean and on-time. They were respectful of my property and ensured none of my plants were damaged and my yard was completely spotless before they left. I received several quotes for my job and Scott and his boss worked diligently to not only earn our business, but to make our insurance claim payment stretch as far as possible. I would recommend ICS without hesitation.

name: Carol Ann Simonds
text: I had a leak and they came within a few hrs of calling to tarp it.  I had a whole roof + decking put on a few weeks later and they were professional, worked well w our Insurance company. Crew was much quicker than the previous roofing company from 15 years ago. Start to finish,  good experience.

name: Sherry Oldham-Coffee
text: Recently had ICS do a roof on an older home. Jonathan was very professional and pleasant when giving the bid and all throughout the process. Communication was fantastic. Had 3 bids and I usually go with the middle bid but I was so impressed with the thorough inspection and bid that I chose ICS even though theirs was the lowest of the three. Had to wait about a month or so for roof to actually go on. Roof looks great and they didn't leave any mess behind so that was also a plus. I would highly recommend ICS Roofing.

name: Beth Kristensen
text: If you need work done to your roof, this is the BEST company to use.  Jonathan came to our home, explained what was needed (a whole new roof) and why.  We had noticed some shingles had fallen from our roof but he showed us pictures of many other shingles (that we were unaware of) that had also blown off.  ICS dealt with our homeowners insurance through the whole process.  The entire company is honest and courteous.  Jonathan kept us informed from start to finish, and everything was done exactly as he promised.  The roof was replaced, the job was done quickly and more importantly, perfectly.  Our new roof is beautiful and the crew that installed it left the exterior of our home and yard cleaner than they found it.  Do not hesitate to use ICS!  Thank you ICS!!

name: Mark Wells
text: From start to finish, this company was highly professional. Project manager, David, was exceptional through the entire process and the work done high quality. Good prices with excellent results.

name: Karen Bishop
text:
I have never had a company work as hard as this one did to get my roof replaced with a days notice.  I cannot stress how great this company was and especially Jonathan Weston who stayed in touch with me from the time the adjuster came until the day it was completed.
He went above and beyond for me.
Thank you ICS for having personnel that cares!

name: gary White
text: Very prompt response,  professional service, HONEST(VERY IMPORTANT,  TO ME). QUALITY WORK AT A COMPETITIVE PRICE. THANKS FOR TAKING CARE OF MY MOMS HOME. WE WILL CALL YOU AGAIN.

name: Katie Loughrist
text: We really appreciated the great customer service we received from this company! They were even generous enough to donate a bit of extra gutters for my garden and for my friend who needed some. They were quick and respectful. When we told them of the few issues we found with the installation, they made it right immediately. Support this local business. They will do right by you!

name: Beverly McCainey
text:
Johnathan was very professional and kept me abreast of everything going on with my home... I was texted of pictures and text messages..... I would recommend this company to my friends and family.
Thank You again,
Beverly A. McCainey

name: Patrick James
text: I had active leaks from storm damage that went unnoticed until water began running into my home. I needed help taking the right steps to quickly stop the damage that was occurring and I did not know who to ask.  I happened to mention my plight to an ICS employee who had dropped by the business where I work, and the ICS team literally did the rest. My project manager, David Prejeant, contacted me,  took the time, and made every effort to baby step me through the proceedures with little worry on my part.  Once the day was set, their install team efficiently and professionally installed our new roof. Once the job was complete, the install team left very little evidence that anyone had been on my roof and my property other than the roof was obviously new and the leaks had stopped.  Then,  the thing that was the ultimate reward for having done business with them, ICS sent an inspector back out after completion to insure the work met their high standards of quality.  On this inspection trip,  the gentleman took extra time to run a magnet around to check again that no troublesome tacks were left behind.  I am thankful I shared my plight with the right person that day!

name: Steveandpamela Valdez
text: They did the work fast and were very thorough. The workers were extremely well disciplined and made sure everything was covered, including our pool, to insure a clean job. When they were through, you couldn’t tell the workers were ever here except for the wonderful roof.  Special thanks to Scott for working so efficiently with us to get everything taken care of in a timely manner.

name: Chip Lazenby
text: Just had roof replaced by Jamie Harris with ICS roofing in Sheffield. Excellent work, start to finish. Jamie was very patient, professional and helpful from start to finish. He made the process easy and non-stressful. The work crew did an excellent job and were friendly and professional. Check these guys out if you need a new roof.

name: Jane Chasan
text:
ICS said it might be 2-4 weeks before my roofing, but were able to schedule sooner. The roofing crew worked 14 hours to replace my roof in one day. The only break they took was for lunch. The cleanup was great.
I would recommend ICS for your roofing needs. Jamie Harris was very nice to work with.
I have several neighbors who have used this business and all were pleased with their work.

name: Caleb Danley
text: Friendly, on-time service.  Replaced the roof, start to finish, in one day.  Very professional from start to cleanup.  Jonathan was great to deal with.  From the beginning he was upfront and honest in regards to the work that was to be completed and the time frame it was going to take.   10/10 would use them again.

name: Patricia Roemer
text: Highly recommend ICS roofing. From the professional estimator Scott Breakfield who was on time, so courteous, answered all my questions, explained the contract, warranties, and  returned calls promptly,  to the super hard working and courteous crew  who did a top notch job on my new roof.  Great job on clean up too, with no damage to shrubs and lawn. Just had Scott out again to have ICS do my gutters. Highly recommend you give him a call.

name: Randy Holm
text: ICS does fantastic work. They have done a couple roofing jobs for us. They are always very professional and do exactly what they say they will do. name: P Hathorn
text: The work was done very professional. We have no problems with the work done. All the workers very nice. David took care of everything. We would recommend this company to anyone needing a new roof.

text: Great job - quick service- roofers dedicated to getting their job done in a timely manner. We appreciate all the staff at ICS Roofing & Construction. Thanks Everyone!

text: Called back with in the day to set a time that was good for me. Got to me quick to check out my roof. Had no damage but happy it was do quick.

text: Outstanding work on my new roof,  cleaned up afterwards,  very efficient . I would recommend them . They removed my old roof, put on the new roof, cleaned up and handled all of my insurance  claims, completely hassle free

text:
Scott Breakfield and his Crew at ICS ROOFING

Call no other company other than ICS ROOFING!!!
